data.text: I naxa mila mixi ɲaaxie ma,
E bɔɲɛ kobi, e xa wɔyɛnyi xɔrɔxɔ.
Lɔnni banxi tima nɛ,
Fe kolonyi a niyama nɛ e xa harige sɔtɔ,
Lɔnnila sɛnbɛ gbo,
I hayi na marasima alako fe xa sɔɔnɛya,
Lɔnni xɔrɔxɔ xaxilitare bɛ,
Mixi naxan fe ɲaaxi xabuma,
Xaxilitareɲa findixi yunubi nan na.
Xa limaniya bama i yi ra tɔɔrɛ kui,
Mixie ratanga naxee na saya kira xɔn ma,
Xa i a falama, «Muxu mu nu a kolon,»
N ma di, kumi nde don,
Kɔnɔ i xa a kolon xaxili luma nɛ alɔ kumi.
I naxa gantanyi itala tinxintɔɛ bɛ,
Tinxintɔɛ nɔma birade sanmaya solofere, a man keli.
I naxa ɲɛlɛxin i yaxui xa birɛ ra,
xa na mu a ra Alatala i xa maɲɔxunyi kobi toma nɛ,
I naxa xɔnɔ fe ɲaaxi rabae ma, i naxa e tɔɔnɛ.
Mixi ɲaaxi mu fe fanyi lima yare,
N ma di, i xa gaaxu Alatala ya ra, i xa mangɛe binya,
barima halaki nan fama e ratɛrɛnnade.
Lɔnnila gbɛtɛe xa taalie nan ya:
Mixi naxan a falama mixi ɲaaxi bɛ, «I tinxin,»
Kɔnɔ mixi naxan mixi ɲaaxi kalamuma nɔndi kui,
Yaabi tinxinxi ɲɔxun nɛ alɔ xanuntenyi xa xɛɛbui.
Fɛntɛn i xa wali ma, i fe raba baloe sɔtɔfe ra,
I naxa i dɔxɔboore tɔɔɲɛgɛ.
I naxa a fala,
N bara dangi tunnaxɔnɛ nde xa xɛ ra,
N tunbee nun ɲooge ɲaaxie nan tun to naa.
N naxa na fe maɲɔxun han a naxa findi xaxili ra n bɛ:
Xixɔli na i suxu, i kinsɔn fɔlɔ, i i bɛlɛxɛe findigilin i ma,
setareɲa fa dutun i ma alɔ muɲɛti ɲaaxi.
